actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the amount of unemployment compensation payable for a week of unemployment, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that unemployment compensation payments be rounded downward to the nearest full dollar amount.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the amount of unemployment compensation payable for a week of unemployment, and for other purposes.
